00069 #ifndef KYRA_BOX_INCLUDED
00070 #define KYRA_BOX_INCLUDED

00072 #include "image.h"
00073 #include "boxresource.h"
00074 
00075 
00076 struct KrPaintInfo;
00077 class  KrBoxResource;
00078 union  KrRGBA;
00079 
00080 
00095 class KrBox : public KrImage
00096 {
00097   public:
00098 
00100         KrBox( KrBoxResource* resource );
00101         KrBox( int width, int height, KrRGBA color, int boxtype );
00102 
00103         virtual ~KrBox();
00104 
00105         virtual KrBox*    ToBox()               { return this; }
00106 
00107         virtual void Draw(      KrPaintInfo* paintInfo, 
00108                                                 const KrRect& clip,
00109                                                 int window );
00110 
00111         int Width()                     { return resource->Width(); }   
00112         int Height()            { return resource->Height(); }  
00113 
00114         
00116         void SetSize( int w, int h );
00118         void SetBoxColor( KrRGBA color );
00120         void SetType( int boxtype );
00121 
00122         virtual KrImNode* Clone();
00123 
00124         virtual bool HitTest( int x, int y, int flags, GlDynArray<KrImage*>* results, int win );
00125         virtual void CalcTransform( int window );
00126         virtual void QueryBoundingBox( KrRect* boundingBox, int window = 0 );
00127         virtual KrResource* Resource()                  { return resource; }
00128         
00129   protected:
00130 
00131   private:
00132         KrBoxResource* resource;
00133         bool owned;                                     // Do we own the resource?
00134 };
